entries.Tue2: It's nice to be able to converse with my patients when I'm out and about in town.$h
entries.Wed2: Now that the weather is warming up again, be sure not to forget that allergies can become a nuisance.
entries.Thu2: I'm not a big fan of the salmonberries that grow this time of year, but it's just a matter of personal taste.#$e#They're actually a very good source of energy, and numerous to boot!
entries.Fri2: Friday is grocery day.#$b#I do need to keep up on my own nutrition as well, of course.
entries.Sat2: Anything I can help with today?
entries.Sun2: I really need to expand my business...#$b#The trouble is, I feel badly even considering the town's health care to be a 'business.'
entries.Mon4: One of my favorite things about this small-town feeling is that I can see how others live their lives as a friend and neighbor, and not just as their doctor.$h#$e#In the city, everything is far too rushed.
entries.Tue4: @, how's life on the farm treating you?#$b#Are you enjoying the big change in pace from the city?#$e#It must have been quite the shift in your life!$h
entries.Thu4: I really need to find more efficient ways to eat healthy.#$e#The problem is that I'm so busy that the quick, cheap meals are usually the easiest.$2
entries.Sun4: @, be sure to schedule your check-up!#$b#Even living off of the land, it's best to stay on top of your health.$h
entries.Tue6: Hey there, @, it's good to see you today!$h
entries.Thu6: Another busy day.#$e#I'll probably have a microwave dinner again tonight and then hop right into bed.
entries.Fri6: You're always welcome to drop by anytime you'd like, @!$h
entries.Sat6: It really feels good to feel like your work has meaning and that you've done true good, doesn't it, @?$h
entries.Mon8: Oh, @! The Flower Dance is this month.#$e#Normally I would feel all awkward about it, but this year I'm feeling pretty confident.$h
entries.Fri8: Were you planning on growing any flowers this season, @?#$b#I know this is the season for new life to flourish!$h#$e#Maybe I'll have to take a stroll by your farm sometime to check it out.$h
entries.Sun8: @, when you're around, it makes me think more about the future than the past.#$e#Thanks for that.$h
entries.Tue10: @, it always brightens my day when you're around.$h
entries.Wed10: I really do love this community. It's grown a lot since you arrived, and I've grown along with it.$h
entries.Thu10: Ah, my favorite patient!$h#$e#...you'd better not be a patient. It's almost unethical for me to treat you, you know.$h
entries.Sat10: It was this time of year that I first met you, @.#$e#It'll always remain one of my favorite times of year.$h
entries.Sun10: I might have the occasional nightmare still...maybe sometime soon a comforting voice won't be too far away, though.$h
entries.summer_Tue: Ah, Tuesday. Always a lot of appointments.
entries.summer_Wed: Let me know if you ever need access to health education resources or materials, my office is full of them.
entries.summer_Sat: Anything I can help with on this fine summer day?
entries.summer_Sun: A village the size of Pelican Town doesn't have very many patients.#$e#I'm sure that's a good thing for the community's health in general, but I have to admit it's not great for the pocket book...
entries.summer_Mon2: I need to look into a good way to ensure I've got enough coffee to stay energized for all of my appointments...
entries.summer_Tue2: Hello Mr. @, you look well. Are you feeling well?^Hello Ms. @, you look well. Are you feeling well?
entries.summer_Wed2: I need to schedule a trip to Zuzu City so I can catch up on new innovations in my field.#$b#Medical science is always on the move!$h
entries.summer_Thu2: Be careful not to overwork yourself, @.#$e#It's one thing to exercise, but a whole other thing to end up in a hospital bed.
entries.summer_Fri2: During the summer when people tend to be healthier, I try to see how else their lives are going and what sorts of healthy improvements they can make.#$e#It's that holistic approach, right?
entries.summer_Sat2: Plan on doing any fishing today, @?#$e#I'm not very good at it, personally.
entries.summer_Sun2: There are some pretty shells that wash up on the beach, but...well...#$b#Some of them really gross me out...$2#$e#Not very becoming of a doctor, is it?$2
entries.summer_Mon4: Hey @, sure is a hot one today, isn't it?#$e#I wish there were a good way to get iced coffee in this town...
entries.summer_Tue4: I definitely appreciate Maru's help in the clinic.#$e#Her interest in science makes her an excellent lab assistant.
entries.summer_Wed4: I didn't always want to be a doctor, you know.#$e#But sometimes childhood passions don't end up as anything more than hobbies in the end.#$e#But that's okay!
entries.summer_Thu4: I'm thinking maybe I should start exercising more myself...#$e#It's so hot, though.$7
entries.summer_Fri4: @, do you have any animals?#$b#Be sure not to keep them cooped up in this heat!$h
entries.summer_Sat4: I always appreciate a good weekend.$h#$e#I'm here in case anyone needs assistance at the clinic, though, of course.
entries.summer_Sun4: I rarely go to the beach, but the summer festivals make a nice change in pace for me.#$e#I go where the town needs me, after all.$h
entries.summer_Mon6: Hey, @, if you happen across any spare quartz, would you mind donating it?#$b#It's useful for repairing some of my medical equipment.$h
entries.summer_Tue6: Sure is hot again today.#$b#I'm glad I've got appointments to keep me inside!$h#$e#Umm, I'm glad that it's cool inside and that I get to stay inside, not that people have reason to come see me.$7
entries.summer_Wed6: I try not to think too hard about my past mistakes, but...#$b#Every now and again, that memory just comes back up to the surface.$2#$e#How do you handle it when something like that happens, @?
entries.summer_Thu6: Oh, @, I always appreciate when you come into the clinic to say 'hi' because you always bring in some much-needed color.$h
entries.summer_Fri6: I was born in the winter, so the summer isn't necessarily my favorite time of year given the heat.$7
entries.summer_Sat6: *yawn* What a week! Especially a hot one.#$e#Anyway, how're you, @?$h
entries.summer_Sun6: Do you ever find yourself missing the city, @?#$e#I don't miss it, but I do think about the past every now and again.
entries.summer_Mon8: I'm a little ashamed to admit this, but I've finally stopped jumping to the assumption that you might be ill or hurting when you come to talk to me.$7#$e#I'm just glad I've made such a close connection here, is all.$h
entries.summer_Tue8: I'm happy to have Maru's help, and she's become a good friend.$h#$e#Nothing more than that, though, of course!$7
entries.summer_Wed8: Hey, @!$h#$e#We should head to Gus's sometime together!#$b#I can put some jazz on the jukebox, and you can dance while I awkwardly try to dance.$h
entries.summer_Thu8: The summer sun's really given you a natural glow, @.$h
entries.summer_Fri8: I should probably take the opportunity while I'm not so busy this season to see more of the valley.#$e#What do you think, @, want to be my tour guide?$h
entries.summer_Sat8: @, once you started going out of your way to visit me on Saturdays, I knew there was just something about you.$h
entries.summer_Sun8: If you can imagine, I found some time to do some actual cooking this past week.#$e#I'd like to thank you for the inspiration to listen to my own healthy advice, @.$h
entries.summer_Mon10: I was thinking that we should take advantage of one of the cooler evenings and watch the fireflies in the forest.#$e#Sounds like fun, right?$h
entries.summer_Tue10: I'm getting better at cooking real food with healthy ingredients!$h#$e#I was thinking I should make something special for us sometime.$4
entries.summer_Wed10: I've never had the opportunity to check out the bath house, as it happens.#$e#Would you want to show me around?#$b#I'd like to investigate its medicinal qualities.$4
entries.summer_Thu10: @! I'm sorry, I'm so busy today.#$e#I'm afraid you'd be a bit of a distraction.$4
entries.summer_Fri10: I tried to broaden my horizons and quell some of my anxiety by walking along the beach the other morning.#$e#Still not a huge fan of some of the gross things that wash up along the shore, but the seaside breeze was definitely refreshing!$h
entries.summer_Sat10: You know, I'd like to think I could be of some help on a farm.#$e#I'm sure my medical training can be adapted to livestock with enough study.$h
entries.summer_Sun10: I can't believe there was a time not so long ago that I doubted my mission here.#$b#I know that I'm doing truly good, meaningful work, and I've made very close relationships that I cherish.$4
entries.fall_Mon: Don't forget that we have medication for sale over the counter now that the weather is starting to get a little more chilly.
entries.fall_Tue: I hate to admit it, but I'm not a huge fan of the fluorescent lighting in here.#$e#Ironically, it's almost too sterile.
entries.fall_Wed: Ah, farmer @.#$b#Keeping up with good nutrition habits, I hope?
entries.fall_Thu: Don't forget that you can restore your energy with foraged items if necessary.
entries.fall_Sun: Ummm...I suppose I can't forget that I need to keep up on sales as well.#$b#Remember, you can always purchase over the counter energy boosts during business hours.
entries.fall_Mon2: One thing you have to appreciate about the country is that the water is just cleaner here than in the city or other urban areas.
entries.fall_Tue2: The festivals this time of year tend to draw outside crowds, so it's an opportunity for me to make a greater impact.$h
entries.fall_Wed2: Making any wine on your farm, @?#$b#There's some scholarly discussion on the benefits of alcoholic drinks, but personally, I enjoy it.$h#$e#Everything in moderation, though!
entries.fall_Thu2: The medicinal properties of mushrooms and other fungi are relatively well-documented, but be careful of the red ones!
entries.fall_Fri2: If you insist on exploring the mines, please be sure to prepare and keep yourself safe.
entries.fall_Sat2: Keep an eye out for recipes for healthy foods that increase your performance and abilities!$h
entries.fall_Sun2: The hazelnuts you see around the area this time of year make for a good flavor component, in my opinion.#$e#Mmm...hazelnut coffee...$h
entries.fall_Mon4: Hey there, @.#$b#It's a beautiful autumn day today, wouldn't you agree?$h#$e#Be sure to stay warm!
entries.fall_Tue4: Are you growing cranberries this time of year, @?#$e#They make an excellent wine, in my opinion.$h
entries.fall_Wed4: The last time I was on a trip to the city in the fall, I saw some hot air balloons in the sky over a field.#$e#It was such a sight!$h
entries.fall_Thu4: Have you heard about this kombucha thing?#$e#It may taste interesting, but the jury's still out on whether there are any benefits to drinking it.#$e#It could even be dangerous if it's not prepared safely.$2
entries.fall_Fri4: I've got to hand it to you, @.#$b#I'm too much of a coward to go spelunking in the caves the way that you seem to be just fine doing.#$e#Please stay safe!$h
entries.fall_Sat4: I'm sure there will be a lot of people out flying on a beautiful autumn weekend like this.$h
entries.fall_Sun4: Are you a fan of jazz music, @?#$b#I think it's less of a distraction if the music doesn't have words.#$e#It helps me get a lot done!$h
entries.fall_Mon6: That incident...that totally preventable incident...that's the reason why I desperately needed a change in pace and started looking for small-town work.$2#$e#I'm sorry, @, I don't mean to burden you. I guess I'm just feeling more expressive today than usual.
entries.fall_Tue6: Oh, @, you should bring some wine by the saloon sometime and we can share it.#$e#I'm uh...I'm sure Gus wouldn't mind.$h
entries.fall_Wed6: @, do you plan on doing the maze at the Spirit's Eve Festival this year?#$b#The exhilaration is as good as exercise as long as your heart rate goes up!$h
entries.fall_Thu6: I've got a conference in Zuzu City coming up.#$e#This time of year is definitely my favorite time to travel across the country by train to see everything all red and golden.$h
entries.fall_Fri6: Hey there, @!#$b#Any interesting plans for the weekend?#$e#Feel free to stop by tomorrow if you've got nothing else going on!$h
entries.fall_Sat6: I've really gotten to know so many really fine people here over the years.#$b#I've just recently started to feel 'at home,' though.$h
entries.fall_Sun6: Enjoying the brisk weather today, @?#$e#Be sure to stop by the clinic if you need anything, but hopefully I won't need to see you for anything medical.$h
entries.fall_Mon8: It's that time of year when you can smell a bonfire from across the valley$h#$e#Normally I would say 'watch out for bug bites if you're out late at night!' but I just want to enjoy the smell of the clean, autumn air for once.$h
entries.fall_Tue8: I sure hope you're making pickles this season, @!#$e#Be sure to save some for me!$h
entries.fall_Wed8: The autumn colors suit you, @.#$e#The really accentuate how cheerful you look!$h
entries.fall_Thu8: I got a new shipment of vitamins in from one of the big city sponsors the other day.#$b#Care to be my guinea pig, @?$h#$e#I'm just kidding, of course, but you can stop by anyway.$h
entries.fall_Fri8: You know, I never had a true appreciation for the importance of working with animals before you came along, @, and shared so much of your life with me.#$e#Maybe business would be better if I were certified in veterinary services as well?$h
entries.fall_Sat8: It's kind of hard to imagine how cold the air in the sky must be this time of year.#$e#It must feel so refreshing to be a pilot.
entries.fall_Sun8: There's just something about watching the world begin to hibernate, isn't there?#$b#Makes me want to settle with a good book, a bottle of wine, and a warm fire.$h
entries.fall_Mon10: I've had plenty of shortcomings in my life...#$b#Not living up to my own initial dream...#$b#Dealing with failures in my training...#$b#Making costly, life-altering mistakes for patients...#$b#@, just having you around gives me the fortitude to move forward and work with confidence.#$e#I'm proud of my work.$h
entries.fall_Tue10: My favorite things? Coffee, pickles, wine, and you.$h#$e#Not necessarily in that order.$h
entries.fall_Wed10: Rain, sleet, or snow, you always work so hard, @.#$e#It's really very inspiring!$h
entries.fall_Thu10: I've got to be studying for my medical recertification.#$e#You could always stop by and help if you'd like!$h
entries.fall_Fri10: Maybe...maybe someday I'll get my amateur pilot's license.#$e#Yes...I feel like I could do anything with you backing me, @.$h
entries.fall_Sat10: @, let's take a hike through the mountains again sometime when we're not busy.#$b#I'd quite like that.$h
entries.fall_Sun10: @! It's just great to see you.#$e#Yes, I'm aware that it wasn't that long ago that I saw you, so what? It's the little things.$h
entries.winter_Mon: Please remember to bundle up and stay dry this time of year.#$e#A good pair of socks goes a long way to prevent loss of body heat through your feet.
entries.winter_Tue: Farmer @, good day.#$b#Is there anything I can help with, or do you need to make an appointment?
entries.winter_Thu: There are some excellent winter roots that provide a good source of energy and nutrients this time of year.#$b#Be sure to keep an eye out!
entries.winter_Fri: It's never hard to keep busy this time of year, that's for sure.
entries.winter_Sat: Anything I can help with on this cold winter day?
entries.winter_Tue2: Most of the villagers seem to dislike the holly that grows this time of year, but I think it's pretty, myself.
entries.winter_Wed2: Please remember to wash your hands when you interact with others, @!$h#$e#Especially if you're working with animals.
entries.winter_Thu2: For some reason people seem to think I want cheese for the Feast of the Winter Star.#$e#Not only is it not very good for you in large amounts, but I just don't like the taste, personally.
entries.winter_Fri2: Have you pickled anything this year?#$e#Winter is traditionally the time to use up those old foods before they go bad.
entries.winter_Sat2: Stopping in to get out of the cold?#$b#No problem!$h
entries.winter_Sun2: I really need to try to find a way to balance keeping people healthy enough to not have to see me while also keeping up on my own bills...
entries.winter_Mon4: Are you keeping busy in the winter, @#$b#I hope you've got animals on the farm to occupy your time.#$e#I like most animal products, just not cheese.$h
entries.winter_Tue4: Cold and flu season...#$e#Lots of appointments on Tuesdays and Thursdays.
entries.winter_Wed4: The week is already halfway gone?#$e#Time sure flies when things get busy, doesn't it?
entries.winter_Thu4: I studied for a long time to practice in the city, but moving to this small town was a pretty easy decision in the end.#$e#I'm just glad to be able to help.$h
entries.winter_Fri4: Hey there, @, do you have any leftover pickles you might be willing to donate to the clinic?#$e#Let me know!$h
entries.winter_Sat4: The airwaves are a little more silent when it's winter here...#$e#I wonder if I should work on a model plane today?
entries.winter_Sun4: It's a good thing I'm familiar with behavioral health resources in our area.#$b#I may or may not have had a bit of a panic attack last night about making ends meet.$2#$e#Oh, I'll be fine, I'm just feeling a little more worn out in the winter, is all.$h
entries.winter_Mon6: I can really dwell on the past a lot.#$b#The gloom of winter reminds me of past mistakes.$2#$e#There are, however, resources to help tackle these kinds of feelings. Always check with your doctor, @.$h
entries.winter_Tue6: Hi, @.#$e#Are you staying productive this season?#$b#I'm busier than ever.$7
entries.winter_Wed6: I'm such a worrier sometimes.#$e#My intentions are good, of course, but I think it's just in my nature to be anxious about some things.
entries.winter_Thu6: I definitely have to admire the chance you took to re-work your life from the urban, corporate grind to something so different.$h
entries.winter_Fri6: I'm so happy with the way that a warm coffee just feels throughout your body during these cold, cold days.$h
entries.winter_Sat6: @, what sorts of hobbies did you have back when you worked in the city?#$e#Do you have any time for them now that you're here?#$e#Or maybe, has your life changed so much for the better that you rarely think about them?$h
entries.winter_Sun6: Even when money is tight, I've been feeling much better about my life in town in general.#$e#I just really enjoy seeing how cheerful and tight-knit everyone is.$h
entries.winter_Mon8: @, you'll be coming by the Feast of the Winter Star, right?#$e#I hope you're my secret gift-giver.#$b#Or it would be great if I were your secret gift-giver!$h
entries.winter_Tue8: Some cold evening, after I'm all done at the clinic, I could come by your farmhouse and we could share a bottle of wine by the fire?#$b#What do you say?$4
entries.winter_Wed8: This is a bad time of year for depression because of the decreased sunlight.#$e#Thankfully I've got someone to talk to if I ever feel like things are getting on top of me.$h
entries.winter_Thu8: Are you looking forward to the new year, @?#$e#I'm just looking forward to the future in general.$4
entries.winter_Fri8: If you happen across any extra holly, let me know! I'd like to decorate the clinic.#$b#And see if I can work on this superstition that holly is bad with my patients.$h
entries.winter_Sat8: The sky is just so clear this time of year, for pilots and us on the ground alike.#$e#Maybe we could stay up to watch the sunrise on the first of the year, @?$h
entries.winter_Sun8: @, please stay bundled up, warm, dry, and healthy.#$e#Can't have you getting sick on me, now.$h
entries.winter_Mon10: @, you're all red.#$b#Here, let me feel your forehead.#$b#...#$b#Okay, you feel normal.#$e#Don't worry me like that, I need you around.$h
entries.winter_Tue10: I've definitely become more bold and energetic, that's for sure.#$e#I'm not even as tired as I used to feel after being so busy in the winter.$h
entries.winter_Wed10: Hypothetically, where would you put radio equipment in your farmhouse?#$e#I was just curious...hypothetically.$h
entries.winter_Thu10: A new year is close, so we should be thinking about new goals for ourselves.#$e#Have anything in particular in mind, @?$h#$e#I...I'm interested in growing my business, of course!$7
entries.winter_Fri10: @, I know that you have more free time during the winter to explore the mines.#$b#Please, please be careful around the monsters.#$e#I trust you know your limit, and I don't know what I'd do if I lost you.
entries.winter_Sat10: I'm looking forward to the end of flu season so I'll have more free time.#$e#It's a shame that once my busy season ends, yours starts back up again, though.$2
entries.winter_Sun10: I'm definitely not too old for a snowball fight, in case you were wondering.$4

entries.Harvey: Hello, @.#$b#Be sure not to catch a cold in this weather!#$e#If you do, though, please feel free to stop by the clinic.
The rain in the valley may be cleaner than in the city, but please remember to change into dry clothes if you get too soaked.
It must be difficult for pilots to fly through too much rain, don't you think?
I have to admit that I really love the smell of the soil when it's raining.#$e#I'm sure your crops love it, @!$h
I've always appreciated the cooler air that comes along with the pouring rain here.#$e#Don't you think it's great, @? I'm sure it must help cool you down.$h

entries.PlayerKilled: none/-100 -100/farmer 20 12 2 Harvey 21 12 3/pause 1500/showFrame 5/message " ...{0}?"/pause 1000/message "Easy, now... take it slow."/viewport 20 12 true/pause 1000/speak Harvey "Someone brought you in, unconscious and in pretty rough shape... I had to perform an emergency surgery on you!#$b#Please be more careful next time, okay?$s"/showFrame 0/pause 1000/emote farmer 28/hospitaldeath/end

none/-100 -100/farmer 20 12 2 Harvey 21 12 3/pause 1500/showFrame 5/message " {0}? ...{0}!"/pause 1000/message "Hey, hey... take it slow."/viewport 20 12 true/pause 1000/speak Harvey "You were in such bad shape... I had to perform an emergency surgery on you!#$b#Please be very careful when defending yourself from monsters, okay?$s"/showFrame 0/pause 1000/emote farmer 28/hospitaldeath/end

none/-100 -100/farmer 20 12 2 Harvey 21 12 3/pause 1500/showFrame 5/message " {0}!"/pause 1000/message "Good, you're awake. You really had me worried there."/viewport 20 12 true/pause 1000/speak Harvey "I had to perform an emergency surgery on you, you were in such awful shape.#$b#Please be so much more careful in the future, okay?$s"/showFrame 0/pause 1000/emote farmer 28/hospitaldeath/end

none/-100 -100/farmer 20 12 2 Harvey 21 12 3/pause 1500/showFrame 5/message " ...{0}? {0}!"/pause 1000/message "Oh, thank goodness."/viewport 20 12 true/pause 1000/speak Harvey "I had to perform an urgent surgery on you, {0}!#$b#Please be careful when you're exploring, please...$s"/showFrame 0/pause 1000/emote farmer 28/hospitaldeath/end

none/-100 -100/farmer 20 12 2 Harvey 21 12 3/pause 1500/showFrame 5/message " ...{0}?"/pause 1000/message "Oh, {0}, thank goodness you're awake..."/viewport 20 12 true/pause 1000/speak Harvey "You were in such terrible shape, I don't know what I would've done if I'd lost you.#$b#I had to perform emergency surgery to save you, and I was so worried...#$b#Please be careful, please...$s"/showFrame 0/pause 1000/emote farmer 28/hospitaldeath/end

none/-100 -100/farmer 20 12 2 Harvey 21 12 3/pause 1500/showFrame 5/message " Honey? ...Honey!"/pause 1000/message "{0}...oh {0}, thank goodness you're all right."/viewport 20 12 true/pause 1000/speak Harvey "I had to save your life, and it was so close. I was so scared...#$b#Please, please {0}, don't worry me like this again...$s"/showFrame 0/pause 1000/emote farmer 28/hospitaldeath/end

entries.Fri.000: Let's see...what to get...#$b#Something healthy, at least...
entries.Fri.001: Hi @, I'm just putting away some groceries.

entries.Fri.000: The selection here is really much healthier than the processed, quick foods at Joja...
entries.Fri.001: Oh hi, @, just a moment while I put away these groceries.

entries.Fri.000: Hi there, @, doing some shopping today?#$b#Be sure to get something healthy!$h
entries.Fri.001: Hey! Great of you to stop in. Here, let me just put these away...

entries.Fri.000: How nice to run into you here, @! Find anything good?$h
entries.Fri.001: Hi, @!$h#$b#I'm just putting these away, give me a minute...

entries.Fri.000: What a fantastic face to happen across here at the store.$h#$b#I hope you're getting something healthy, of course!$h
entries.Fri.001: Give me a moment to put these away and then I'm all yours.$4

Changes.LogName: Male Harvey Stardew Valley Fair 4 Hearts

entries.Harvey: Hi, @, enjoying the fair?#$b#The smell of those pork ribs is really enticing...but these poor pigs right here...$7

Changes.LogName: Male Harvey Stardew Valley Fair 8 Hearts

entries.Harvey: I just love the smell of festival food, don't you, @?$h#$e#I'll try not to think too hard about where it comes from...

Changes.LogName: Male Harvey Stardew Valley Fair 10 Hearts

entries.Harvey: @!$h#$b#Don't these look like great pigs? Their anatomies are very similar to humans, you know.$h#$e#Are you having a good time at the fair?$h
Oh, goodness!$8#$b#You scared me, @.$8#$e#Honestly...I'm just hiding here where it seems relatively safe...$2
@!$8#$b#Not sure what I was thinking coming in here without you...$2
Oh, @, thank goodness, it's you.$2#$e#I should've stayed out in the food court and waited for you...$4
It's nice to see the town so lively in celebration of the season.#$e#The pastel colors are fun, and eggs are good for you, to boot!$h
Did you buy any strawberry seeds, @?#$b#They're definitely a healthy way to incorporate something sweet into your diet.$h
@, isn't it nice to see the town so lively with everyone celebrating the health of the valley?$h#$e#No, I don't think I'm being too doctor-y, it's true!$7
Great day for a dance, don't you think, dear?$h#$b#I'm just catching up with some friends here, but let me know when it's time to dance.$h
I'm definitely feeling more confident this year.$h
Hey, @! Are you enjoying the food and the good feelings?$h#$e#If you're looking for a dance partner, don't hesitate to let me know.$4
@, of course I expected to find you here.$h#$e#Anything you wanted to ask me, or were you just making the rounds?$4
Hey there, @, do you need to borrow any sunscreen?#$b#Careful not to get burned, the sun can cause lasting damage, you know!$h
@, did you bring something healthy to add to the pot?$h#$e#You always have nutritious products from your farm.$h
It sure is hot out!$7#$b#Would you want to take a swim together to cool down afterward?#$b#As long as we don't go too far out into the ocean, of course.$h

This is probably one of my favorite events, honestly.#$b#Not only is it a wonder of biology, but it's a wonder of nature, too.$h#$e#I'm so glad that we can experience this together every year from now on, @.$4
The end of another summer.#$b#I'm grateful that it'll be cooling down, although I'll miss the extra free time at the clinic.$h
@, don't the stars look great tonight?#$e#It's easy to forget just how wondrous the world can be until you're met with a night like tonight, between the ocean and the sky.$h
Good evening, @, are you ready for summer to end?#$b#I, for one, am sad that I'll have less free time to see you, but be sure to stop by the clinic and say 'hi!'$h
Hi there, @, are you feeling warm enough to safely enjoy the festival?#$e#If you participate in the contest, please be sure not to fall in the freezing cold water!$h
It's nice to see everyone out enjoying the cold weather, isn't it?#$e#I'm not even feeling too doctor-y today!$h
@, after you've finished up here, can we go warm up by the fire in your farmhouse?$4#$e#I don't want you to catch a cold, after all!$h
I'm grateful that no one caught the flu too badly, and I'm grateful that everyone is so happy to be here together.
I'm most grateful for the fact that I've begun to feel like a true part of the community, along with having made and developed some great relationships this year.$4
Happy Feast of the Winter Star, @!$h#$e#I'm most grateful for the confidence and happiness you've brought to my life.$4

entries.Introduction: It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm Harriet, the local doctor.#$e#I perform regular check-ups and medical procedures for all the residents of Pelican Town. It's rewarding work.#$e#I hope you'll find your own work equally rewarding, in time.$h
entries.Tue2: It's nice to be able to converse with my patients when I'm out and about in town.$h
entries.Wed2: Now that the weather is warming up again, be sure not to forget that allergies can become a nuisance.
entries.Thu2: I'm not a big fan of the salmonberries that grow this time of year, but it's just a matter of personal taste.#$e#They're actually a very good source of energy, and numerous to boot!
entries.Fri2: Friday is grocery day.#$b#I do need to keep up on my own nutrition as well, of course.
entries.Sat2: Anything I can help with today?
entries.Sun2: I really need to expand my business...#$b#The trouble is, I feel badly even considering the town's health care to be a 'business.'
entries.Mon4: One of my favorite things about this small-town feeling is that I can see how others live their lives as a friend and neighbor, and not just as their doctor.$h#$e#In the city, everything is far too rushed.
entries.Tue4: @, how's life on the farm treating you?#$b#Are you enjoying the big change in pace from the city?#$e#It must have been quite the shift in your life!$h
entries.Thu4: I really need to find more efficient ways to eat healthy.#$e#The problem is that I'm so busy that the quick, cheap meals are usually the easiest.$2
entries.Sun4: @, be sure to schedule your check-up!#$b#Even living off of the land, it's best to stay on top of your health.$h
entries.Tue6: Hey there, @, it's good to see you today!$h
entries.Thu6: Another busy day.#$e#I'll probably have a microwave dinner again tonight and then hop right into bed.
entries.Fri6: You're always welcome to drop by anytime you'd like, @!$h
entries.Sat6: It really feels good to feel like your work has meaning and that you've done true good, doesn't it, @?$h
entries.Mon8: Oh, @! The Flower Dance is this month.#$e#Normally I would feel all awkward about it, but this year I'm feeling pretty confident.$h
entries.Fri8: Were you planning on growing any flowers this season, @?#$b#I know this is the season for new life to flourish!$h#$e#Maybe I'll have to take a stroll by your farm sometime to check it out.$h
entries.Sun8: @, when you're around, it makes me think more about the future than the past.#$e#Thanks for that.$h
entries.Tue10: @, it always brightens my day when you're around.$h
entries.Wed10: I really do love this community. It's grown a lot since you arrived, and I've grown along with it.$h
entries.Thu10: Ah, my favorite patient!$h#$e#...you'd better not be a patient. It's almost unethical for me to treat you, you know.$h
entries.Sat10: It was this time of year that I first met you, @.#$e#It'll always remain one of my favorite times of year.$h
entries.Sun10: I might have the occasional nightmare still...maybe sometime soon a comforting voice won't be too far away, though.$h
entries.summer_Tue: Ah, Tuesday. Always a lot of appointments.
entries.summer_Wed: Let me know if you ever need access to health education resources or materials, my office is full of them.
entries.summer_Sat: Anything I can help with on this fine summer day?
entries.summer_Sun: A village the size of Pelican Town doesn't have very many patients.#$e#I'm sure that's a good thing for the community's health in general, but I have to admit it's not great for the pocket book...
entries.summer_Mon2: I need to look into a good way to ensure I've got enough coffee to stay energized for all of my appointments...
entries.summer_Tue2: Hello Mr. @, you look well. Are you feeling well?^Hello Ms. @, you look well. Are you feeling well?
entries.summer_Wed2: I need to schedule a trip to Zuzu City so I can catch up on new innovations in my field.#$b#Medical science is always on the move!$h
entries.summer_Thu2: Be careful not to overwork yourself, @.#$e#It's one thing to exercise, but a whole other thing to end up in a hospital bed.
entries.summer_Fri2: During the summer when people tend to be healthier, I try to see how else their lives are going and what sorts of healthy improvements they can make.#$e#It's that holistic approach, right?
entries.summer_Sat2: Plan on doing any fishing today, @?#$e#I'm not very good at it, personally.
entries.summer_Sun2: There are some pretty shells that wash up on the beach, but...well...#$b#Some of them really gross me out...$2#$e#Not very becoming of a doctor, is it?$2
entries.summer_Mon4: Hey @, sure is a hot one today, isn't it?#$e#I wish there were a good way to get iced coffee in this town...
entries.summer_Tue4: I definitely appreciate Maru's help in the clinic.#$e#Her interest in science makes her an excellent lab assistant.
entries.summer_Wed4: I didn't always want to be a doctor, you know.#$e#But sometimes childhood passions don't end up as anything more than hobbies in the end.#$e#But that's okay!
entries.summer_Thu4: I'm thinking maybe I should start exercising more myself...#$e#It's so hot, though.$7
entries.summer_Fri4: @, do you have any animals?#$b#Be sure not to keep them cooped up in this heat!$h
entries.summer_Sat4: I always appreciate a good weekend.$h#$e#I'm here in case anyone needs assistance at the clinic, though, of course.
entries.summer_Sun4: I rarely go to the beach, but the summer festivals make a nice change in pace for me.#$e#I go where the town needs me, after all.$h
entries.summer_Mon6: Hey, @, if you happen across any spare quartz, would you mind donating it?#$b#It's useful for repairing some of my medical equipment.$h
entries.summer_Tue6: Sure is hot again today.#$b#I'm glad I've got appointments to keep me inside!$h#$e#Umm, I'm glad that it's cool inside and that I get to stay inside, not that people have reason to come see me.$7
entries.summer_Wed6: I try not to think too hard about my past mistakes, but...#$b#Every now and again, that memory just comes back up to the surface.$2#$e#How do you handle it when something like that happens, @?
entries.summer_Thu6: Oh, @, I always appreciate when you come into the clinic to say 'hi' because you always bring in some much-needed color.$h
entries.summer_Fri6: I was born in the winter, so the summer isn't necessarily my favorite time of year given the heat.$7
entries.summer_Sat6: *yawn* What a week! Especially a hot one.#$e#Anyway, how're you, @?$h
entries.summer_Sun6: Do you ever find yourself missing the city, @?#$e#I don't miss it, but I do think about the past every now and again.
entries.summer_Mon8: I'm a little ashamed to admit this, but I've finally stopped jumping to the assumption that you might be ill or hurting when you come to talk to me.$7#$e#I'm just glad I've made such a close connection here, is all.$h
entries.summer_Tue8: I'm happy to have Maru's help, and she's become a good friend.$h#$e#Nothing more than that, though, of course!$7
entries.summer_Wed8: Hey, @!$h#$e#We should head to Gus's sometime together!#$b#I can put some jazz on the jukebox, and you can dance while I awkwardly try to dance.$h
entries.summer_Thu8: The summer sun's really given you a natural glow, @.$h
entries.summer_Fri8: I should probably take the opportunity while I'm not so busy this season to see more of the valley.#$e#What do you think, @, want to be my tour guide?$h
entries.summer_Sat8: @, once you started going out of your way to visit me on Saturdays, I knew there was just something about you.$h
entries.summer_Sun8: If you can imagine, I found some time to do some actual cooking this past week.#$e#I'd like to thank you for the inspiration to listen to my own healthy advice, @.$h
entries.summer_Mon10: I was thinking that we should take advantage of one of the cooler evenings and watch the fireflies in the forest.#$e#Sounds like fun, right?$h
entries.summer_Tue10: I'm getting better at cooking real food with healthy ingredients!$h#$e#I was thinking I should make something special for us sometime.$4
entries.summer_Wed10: I've never had the opportunity to check out the bath house, as it happens.#$e#Would you want to show me around?#$b#I'd like to investigate its medicinal qualities.$4
entries.summer_Thu10: @! I'm sorry, I'm so busy today.#$e#I'm afraid you'd be a bit of a distraction.$4
entries.summer_Fri10: I tried to broaden my horizons and quell some of my anxiety by walking along the beach the other morning.#$e#Still not a huge fan of some of the gross things that wash up along the shore, but the seaside breeze was definitely refreshing!$h
entries.summer_Sat10: You know, I'd like to think I could be of some help on a farm.#$e#I'm sure my medical training can be adapted to livestock with enough study.$h
entries.summer_Sun10: I can't believe there was a time not so long ago that I doubted my mission here.#$b#I know that I'm doing truly good, meaningful work, and I've made very close relationships that I cherish.$4
entries.fall_Mon: Don't forget that we have medication for sale over the counter now that the weather is starting to get a little more chilly.
entries.fall_Tue: I hate to admit it, but I'm not a huge fan of the fluorescent lighting in here.#$e#Ironically, it's almost too sterile.
entries.fall_Wed: Ah, farmer @.#$b#Keeping up with good nutrition habits, I hope?
entries.fall_Thu: Don't forget that you can restore your energy with foraged items if necessary.
entries.fall_Sun: Ummm...I suppose I can't forget that I need to keep up on sales as well.#$b#Remember, you can always purchase over the counter energy boosts during business hours.
entries.fall_Mon2: One thing you have to appreciate about the country is that the water is just cleaner here than in the city or other urban areas.
entries.fall_Tue2: The festivals this time of year tend to draw outside crowds, so it's an opportunity for me to make a greater impact.$h
entries.fall_Wed2: Making any wine on your farm, @?#$b#There's some scholarly discussion on the benefits of alcoholic drinks, but personally, I enjoy it.$h#$e#Everything in moderation, though!
entries.fall_Thu2: The medicinal properties of mushrooms and other fungi are relatively well-documented, but be careful of the red ones!
entries.fall_Fri2: If you insist on exploring the mines, please be sure to prepare and keep yourself safe.
entries.fall_Sat2: Keep an eye out for recipes for healthy foods that increase your performance and abilities!$h
entries.fall_Sun2: The hazelnuts you see around the area this time of year make for a good flavor component, in my opinion.#$e#Mmm...hazelnut coffee...$h
entries.fall_Mon4: Hey there, @.#$b#It's a beautiful autumn day today, wouldn't you agree?$h#$e#Be sure to stay warm!
entries.fall_Tue4: Are you growing cranberries this time of year, @?#$e#They make an excellent wine, in my opinion.$h
entries.fall_Wed4: The last time I was on a trip to the city in the fall, I saw some hot air balloons in the sky over a field.#$e#It was such a sight!$h
entries.fall_Thu4: Have you heard about this kombucha thing?#$e#It may taste interesting, but the jury's still out on whether there are any benefits to drinking it.#$e#It could even be dangerous if it's not prepared safely.$2
entries.fall_Fri4: I've got to hand it to you, @.#$b#I'm too much of a coward to go spelunking in the caves the way that you seem to be just fine doing.#$e#Please stay safe!$h
entries.fall_Sat4: I'm sure there will be a lot of people out flying on a beautiful autumn weekend like this.$h
entries.fall_Sun4: Are you a fan of jazz music, @?#$b#I think it's less of a distraction if the music doesn't have words.#$e#It helps me get a lot done!$h
entries.fall_Mon6: That incident...that totally preventable incident...that's the reason why I desperately needed a change in pace and started looking for small-town work.$2#$e#I'm sorry, @, I don't mean to burden you. I guess I'm just feeling more expressive today than usual.
entries.fall_Tue6: Oh, @, you should bring some wine by the saloon sometime and we can share it.#$e#I'm uh...I'm sure Gus wouldn't mind.$h
entries.fall_Wed6: @, do you plan on doing the maze at the Spirit's Eve Festival this year?#$b#The exhilaration is as good as exercise as long as your heart rate goes up!$h
entries.fall_Thu6: I've got a conference in Zuzu City coming up.#$e#This time of year is definitely my favorite time to travel across the country by train to see everything all red and golden.$h
entries.fall_Fri6: Hey there, @!#$b#Any interesting plans for the weekend?#$e#Feel free to stop by tomorrow if you've got nothing else going on!$h
entries.fall_Sat6: I've really gotten to know so many really fine people here over the years.#$b#I've just recently started to feel 'at home,' though.$h
entries.fall_Sun6: Enjoying the brisk weather today, @?#$e#Be sure to stop by the clinic if you need anything, but hopefully I won't need to see you for anything medical.$h
entries.fall_Mon8: It's that time of year when you can smell a bonfire from across the valley$h#$e#Normally I would say 'watch out for bug bites if you're out late at night!' but I just want to enjoy the smell of the clean, autumn air for once.$h
entries.fall_Tue8: I sure hope you're making pickles this season, @!#$e#Be sure to save some for me!$h
entries.fall_Wed8: The autumn colors suit you, @.#$e#The really accentuate how cheerful you look!$h
entries.fall_Thu8: I got a new shipment of vitamins in from one of the big city sponsors the other day.#$b#Care to be my guinea pig, @?$h#$e#I'm just kidding, of course, but you can stop by anyway.$h
entries.fall_Fri8: You know, I never had a true appreciation for the importance of working with animals before you came along, @, and shared so much of your life with me.#$e#Maybe business would be better if I were certified in veterinary services as well?$h
entries.fall_Sat8: It's kind of hard to imagine how cold the air in the sky must be this time of year.#$e#It must feel so refreshing to be a pilot.
entries.fall_Sun8: There's just something about watching the world begin to hibernate, isn't there?#$b#Makes me want to settle with a good book, a bottle of wine, and a warm fire.$h
entries.fall_Mon10: I've had plenty of shortcomings in my life...#$b#Not living up to my own initial dream...#$b#Dealing with failures in my training...#$b#Making costly, life-altering mistakes for patients...#$b#@, just having you around gives me the fortitude to move forward and work with confidence.#$e#I'm proud of my work.$h
entries.fall_Tue10: My favorite things? Coffee, pickles, wine, and you.$h#$e#Not necessarily in that order.$h
entries.fall_Wed10: Rain, sleet, or snow, you always work so hard, @.#$e#It's really very inspiring!$h
entries.fall_Thu10: I've got to be studying for my medical recertification.#$e#You could always stop by and help if you'd like!$h
entries.fall_Fri10: Maybe...maybe someday I'll get my amateur pilot's license.#$e#Yes...I feel like I could do anything with you backing me, @.$h
entries.fall_Sat10: @, let's take a hike through the mountains again sometime when we're not busy.#$b#I'd quite like that.$h
entries.fall_Sun10: @! It's just great to see you.#$e#Yes, I'm aware that it wasn't that long ago that I saw you, so what? It's the little things.$h
entries.winter_Mon: Please remember to bundle up and stay dry this time of year.#$e#A good pair of socks goes a long way to prevent loss of body heat through your feet.
entries.winter_Tue: Farmer @, good day.#$b#Is there anything I can help with, or do you need to make an appointment?
entries.winter_Thu: There are some excellent winter roots that provide a good source of energy and nutrients this time of year.#$b#Be sure to keep an eye out!
entries.winter_Fri: It's never hard to keep busy this time of year, that's for sure.
entries.winter_Sat: Anything I can help with on this cold winter day?
entries.winter_Tue2: Most of the villagers seem to dislike the holly that grows this time of year, but I think it's pretty, myself.
entries.winter_Wed2: Please remember to wash your hands when you interact with others, @!$h#$e#Especially if you're working with animals.
entries.winter_Thu2: For some reason people seem to think I want cheese for the Feast of the Winter Star.#$e#Not only is it not very good for you in large amounts, but I just don't like the taste, personally.
entries.winter_Fri2: Have you pickled anything this year?#$e#Winter is traditionally the time to use up those old foods before they go bad.
entries.winter_Sat2: Stopping in to get out of the cold?#$b#No problem!$h
entries.winter_Sun2: I really need to try to find a way to balance keeping people healthy enough to not have to see me while also keeping up on my own bills...
entries.winter_Mon4: Are you keeping busy in the winter, @#$b#I hope you've got animals on the farm to occupy your time.#$e#I like most animal products, just not cheese.$h
entries.winter_Tue4: Cold and flu season...#$e#Lots of appointments on Tuesdays and Thursdays.
entries.winter_Wed4: The week is already halfway gone?#$e#Time sure flies when things get busy, doesn't it?
entries.winter_Thu4: I studied for a long time to practice in the city, but moving to this small town was a pretty easy decision in the end.#$e#I'm just glad to be able to help.$h
entries.winter_Fri4: Hey there, @, do you have any leftover pickles you might be willing to donate to the clinic?#$e#Let me know!$h
entries.winter_Sat4: The airwaves are a little more silent when it's winter here...#$e#I wonder if I should work on a model plane today?
entries.winter_Sun4: It's a good thing I'm familiar with behavioral health resources in our area.#$b#I may or may not have had a bit of a panic attack last night about making ends meet.$2#$e#Oh, I'll be fine, I'm just feeling a little more worn out in the winter, is all.$h
entries.winter_Mon6: I can really dwell on the past a lot.#$b#The gloom of winter reminds me of past mistakes.$2#$e#There are, however, resources to help tackle these kinds of feelings. Always check with your doctor, @.$h
entries.winter_Tue6: Hi, @.#$e#Are you staying productive this season?#$b#I'm busier than ever.$7
entries.winter_Wed6: I'm such a worrier sometimes.#$e#My intentions are good, of course, but I think it's just in my nature to be anxious about some things.
entries.winter_Thu6: I definitely have to admire the chance you took to re-work your life from the urban, corporate grind to something so different.$h
entries.winter_Fri6: I'm so happy with the way that a warm coffee just feels throughout your body during these cold, cold days.$h
entries.winter_Sat6: @, what sorts of hobbies did you have back when you worked in the city?#$e#Do you have any time for them now that you're here?#$e#Or maybe, has your life changed so much for the better that you rarely think about them?$h
entries.winter_Sun6: Even when money is tight, I've been feeling much better about my life in town in general.#$e#I just really enjoy seeing how cheerful and tight-knit everyone is.$h
entries.winter_Mon8: @, you'll be coming by the Feast of the Winter Star, right?#$e#I hope you're my secret gift-giver.#$b#Or it would be great if I were your secret gift-giver!$h
entries.winter_Tue8: Some cold evening, after I'm all done at the clinic, I could come by your farmhouse and we could share a bottle of wine by the fire?#$b#What do you say?$4
entries.winter_Wed8: This is a bad time of year for depression because of the decreased sunlight.#$e#Thankfully I've got someone to talk to if I ever feel like things are getting on top of me.$h
entries.winter_Thu8: Are you looking forward to the new year, @?#$e#I'm just looking forward to the future in general.$4
entries.winter_Fri8: If you happen across any extra holly, let me know! I'd like to decorate the clinic.#$b#And see if I can work on this superstition that holly is bad with my patients.$h
entries.winter_Sat8: The sky is just so clear this time of year, for pilots and us on the ground alike.#$e#Maybe we could stay up to watch the sunrise on the first of the year, @?$h
entries.winter_Sun8: @, please stay bundled up, warm, dry, and healthy.#$e#Can't have you getting sick on me, now.$h
entries.winter_Mon10: @, you're all red.#$b#Here, let me feel your forehead.#$b#...#$b#Okay, you feel normal.#$e#Don't worry me like that, I need you around.$h
entries.winter_Tue10: I've definitely become more bold and energetic, that's for sure.#$e#I'm not even as tired as I used to feel after being so busy in the winter.$h
entries.winter_Wed10: Hypothetically, where would you put radio equipment in your farmhouse?#$e#I was just curious...hypothetically.$h
entries.winter_Thu10: A new year is close, so we should be thinking about new goals for ourselves.#$e#Have anything in particular in mind, @?$h#$e#I...I'm interested in growing my business, of course!$7
entries.winter_Fri10: @, I know that you have more free time during the winter to explore the mines.#$b#Please, please be careful around the monsters.#$e#I trust you know your limit, and I don't know what I'd do if I lost you.
entries.winter_Sat10: I'm looking forward to the end of flu season so I'll have more free time.#$e#It's a shame that once my busy season ends, yours starts back up again, though.$2
entries.winter_Sun10: I'm definitely not too old for a snowball fight, in case you were wondering.$4

entries.Harvey: Hello, @.#$b#Be sure not to catch a cold in this weather!#$e#If you do, though, please feel free to stop by the clinic.
The rain in the valley may be cleaner than in the city, but please remember to change into dry clothes if you get too soaked.
It must be difficult for pilots to fly through too much rain, don't you think?
I have to admit that I really love the smell of the soil when it's raining.#$e#I'm sure your crops love it, @!$h
I've always appreciated the cooler air that comes along with the pouring rain here.#$e#Don't you think it's great, @? I'm sure it must help cool you down.$h

entries.PlayerKilled: none/-100 -100/farmer 20 12 2 Harvey 21 12 3/pause 1500/showFrame 5/message " ...{0}?"/pause 1000/message "Easy, now... take it slow."/viewport 20 12 true/pause 1000/speak Harvey "Someone brought you in, unconscious and in pretty rough shape... I had to perform an emergency surgery on you!#$b#Please be more careful next time, okay?$s"/showFrame 0/pause 1000/emote farmer 28/hospitaldeath/end

none/-100 -100/farmer 20 12 2 Harvey 21 12 3/pause 1500/showFrame 5/message " {0}? ...{0}!"/pause 1000/message "Hey, hey... take it slow."/viewport 20 12 true/pause 1000/speak Harvey "You were in such bad shape... I had to perform an emergency surgery on you!#$b#Please be very careful when defending yourself from monsters, okay?$s"/showFrame 0/pause 1000/emote farmer 28/hospitaldeath/end

none/-100 -100/farmer 20 12 2 Harvey 21 12 3/pause 1500/showFrame 5/message " {0}!"/pause 1000/message "Good, you're awake. You really had me worried there."/viewport 20 12 true/pause 1000/speak Harvey "I had to perform an emergency surgery on you, you were in such awful shape.#$b#Please be so much more careful in the future, okay?$s"/showFrame 0/pause 1000/emote farmer 28/hospitaldeath/end

none/-100 -100/farmer 20 12 2 Harvey 21 12 3/pause 1500/showFrame 5/message " ...{0}? {0}!"/pause 1000/message "Oh, thank goodness."/viewport 20 12 true/pause 1000/speak Harvey "I had to perform an urgent surgery on you, {0}!#$b#Please be careful when you're exploring, please...$s"/showFrame 0/pause 1000/emote farmer 28/hospitaldeath/end

none/-100 -100/farmer 20 12 2 Harvey 21 12 3/pause 1500/showFrame 5/message " ...{0}?"/pause 1000/message "Oh, {0}, thank goodness you're awake..."/viewport 20 12 true/pause 1000/speak Harvey "You were in such terrible shape, I don't know what I would've done if I'd lost you.#$b#I had to perform emergency surgery to save you, and I was so worried...#$b#Please be careful, please...$s"/showFrame 0/pause 1000/emote farmer 28/hospitaldeath/end

none/-100 -100/farmer 20 12 2 Harvey 21 12 3/pause 1500/showFrame 5/message " Honey? ...Honey!"/pause 1000/message "{0}...oh {0}, thank goodness you're all right."/viewport 20 12 true/pause 1000/speak Harvey "I had to save your life, and it was so close. I was so scared...#$b#Please, please {0}, don't worry me like this again...$s"/showFrame 0/pause 1000/emote farmer 28/hospitaldeath/end

entries.Fri.000: Let's see...what to get...#$b#Something healthy, at least...
entries.Fri.001: Hi @, I'm just putting away some groceries.

entries.Fri.000: The selection here is really much healthier than the processed, quick foods at Joja...
entries.Fri.001: Oh hi, @, just a moment while I put away these groceries.

entries.Fri.000: Hi there, @, doing some shopping today?#$b#Be sure to get something healthy!$h
entries.Fri.001: Hey! Great of you to stop in. Here, let me just put these away...

entries.Fri.000: How nice to run into you here, @! Find anything good?$h
entries.Fri.001: Hi, @!$h#$b#I'm just putting these away, give me a minute...

entries.Fri.000: What a fantastic face to happen across here at the store.$h#$b#I hope you're getting something healthy, of course!$h
entries.Fri.001: Give me a moment to put these away and then I'm all yours.$4

Changes.LogName: Female Harvey Stardew Valley Fair 4 Hearts

entries.Harvey: Hi, @, enjoying the fair?#$b#The smell of those pork ribs is really enticing...but these poor pigs right here...$7

Changes.LogName: Female Harvey Stardew Valley Fair 8 Hearts

entries.Harvey: I just love the smell of festival food, don't you, @?$h#$e#I'll try not to think too hard about where it comes from...

Changes.LogName: Female Harvey Stardew Valley Fair 10 Hearts

entries.Harvey: @!$h#$b#Don't these look like great pigs? Their anatomies are very similar to humans, you know.$h#$e#Are you having a good time at the fair?$h
Oh, goodness!$8#$b#You scared me, @.$8#$e#Honestly...I'm just hiding here where it seems relatively safe...$2
@!$8#$b#Not sure what I was thinking coming in here without you...$2
Oh, @, thank goodness, it's you.$2#$e#I should've stayed out in the food court and waited for you...$4
It's nice to see the town so lively in celebration of the season.#$e#The pastel colors are fun, and eggs are good for you, to boot!$h
Did you buy any strawberry seeds, @?#$b#They're definitely a healthy way to incorporate something sweet into your diet.$h
@, isn't it nice to see the town so lively with everyone celebrating the health of the valley?$h#$e#No, I don't think I'm being too doctor-y, it's true!$7
Great day for a dance, don't you think, dear?$h#$b#I'm just catching up with some friends here, but let me know when it's time to dance.$h
I'm definitely feeling more confident this year.$h
Hey, @! Are you enjoying the food and the good feelings?$h#$e#If you're looking for a dance partner, don't hesitate to let me know.$4
@, of course I expected to find you here.$h#$e#Anything you wanted to ask me, or were you just making the rounds?$4
Hey there, @, do you need to borrow any sunscreen?#$b#Careful not to get burned, the sun can cause lasting damage, you know!$h
@, did you bring something healthy to add to the pot?$h#$e#You always have nutritious products from your farm.$h
It sure is hot out!$7#$b#Would you want to take a swim together to cool down afterward?#$b#As long as we don't go too far out into the ocean, of course.$h

This is probably one of my favorite events, honestly.#$b#Not only is it a wonder of biology, but it's a wonder of nature, too.$h#$e#I'm so glad that we can experience this together every year from now on, @.$4
The end of another summer.#$b#I'm grateful that it'll be cooling down, although I'll miss the extra free time at the clinic.$h
@, don't the stars look great tonight?#$e#It's easy to forget just how wondrous the world can be until you're met with a night like tonight, between the ocean and the sky.$h
Good evening, @, are you ready for summer to end?#$b#I, for one, am sad that I'll have less free time to see you, but be sure to stop by the clinic and say 'hi!'$h
Hi there, @, are you feeling warm enough to safely enjoy the festival?#$e#If you participate in the contest, please be sure not to fall in the freezing cold water!$h
It's nice to see everyone out enjoying the cold weather, isn't it?#$e#I'm not even feeling too doctor-y today!$h
@, after you've finished up here, can we go warm up by the fire in your farmhouse?$4#$e#I don't want you to catch a cold, after all!$h
I'm grateful that no one caught the flu too badly, and I'm grateful that everyone is so happy to be here together.
I'm most grateful for the fact that I've begun to feel like a true part of the community, along with having made and developed some great relationships this year.$4
Happy Feast of the Winter Star, @!$h#$e#I'm most grateful for the confidence and happiness you've brought to my life.$4

entries.56/f Harvey 500/p George: jaunty/16 18/farmer 9 24 0 George 16 18 1 Harvey 15 18 1/skippable/move farmer 0 -4 1/move farmer 1 0 1/speak Harvey "Okay, George. I want you take a deep breath for me."/pause 700/speak Harvey "Mmhmm... turn around, please."/pause 300/faceDirection George 2/faceDirection George 3/speak Harvey "George, I'll be honest with you. You need to make some changes in your lifestyle if you want to stay healthy.#$b#I'd like you to reduce your sodium intake, and try to get some moderate exercise with your arms."/emote George 12/speak George "Hmmph... I know what's best for me. Who do you think you are, telling me how to live my life?"/pause 500/speak Harvey "I'm your doctor, George. That's who I am...#$b#And I went to school for 8 years so I could learn how to help people stay healthy."/move farmer 0 -1 1/move farmer 5 0 0/faceDirection Harvey 2 true/faceDirection George 2/speak Harvey "Oh!#$b#I'm sorry, but you shouldn't be here... these check-ups are supposed to be private."/faceDirection farmer 3/speak George "Not so fast! I'd like to get a second opinion from this young man.^Not so fast! I'd like to get a second opinion from this young lady."/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Harvey "Very well..."/speak Harvey "$q 84 null#@, what do you think George should do?#$r 84 40 event_george1#George should follow Dr. Harriet's advice.#$r 85 -40 event_george2#George knows what's best for his own body."/faceDirection Harvey 1/faceDirection George 2/emote George 28/speak George "Fine. I'll do what you say, doctor."/pause 500/faceDirection Harvey 2/speak Harvey "$p 84#Thanks for your help, @. I appreciate it.$h|It's better not to give my patients mixed messages, @. Please remember that in the future."/end

entries.normal: pause 400/speak Harvey "Sorry I'm all disheveled... I didn't know you were coming over.$h"/move farmer 0 -2 0/pause 600/speak Harvey "Hey, I think I hear a plane overhead..."/move Harvey 0 1 3/move Harvey -3 0 0/move Harvey 0 -2 0/speak Harvey "@, get over here!"/move farmer 0 -1 3/move farmer -4 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 0/speak Harvey "Look!"/globalFade/cutscene plane/viewport -1000 -1000/speak Harvey "As a girl, my dream was always to be a pilot."/pause 1000/speak Harvey "...But with my bad eyesight and a crippling fear of heights, that dream started to fade away.$s"/faceDirection Harvey 3/faceDirection farmer 1/viewport 5 6 true/pause 1000/emote farmer 28/speak Harvey "It's okay... don't be sad.#$b#I've grown to accept my station in life. Not everyone can achieve their dreams... that's just the way the world is."/pause 1600/speak Harvey "Hey, let me show you my model airplanes. I just finished the new TR-Starbird deluxe set.$h"/advancedMove Harvey false 0 2 4 0/faceDirection farmer 2/end

entries.fall_25.002: Excuse me, I have to say some things to Doctor Harriet in private...$u

entries.summer_25.001: Doctor Harriet, have you read the latest 'Biology and Medicine'? There's an article I think you'd be interested in.

entries.23.000: Now now, dear... It's important that Doctor Harriet takes a good look at you. She's a nice young lady! Behave yourself, for your dear old wife's sake.

entries.winter_18.001: Can you show me how this tool works, Doctor Harriet?

entries.spring_11.002: Doctor Harriet? I'm worried about Vincent's height. Isn't he a little short for his age?

entries.spring_16.001: Do I look healthy, Doctor Harriet?

entries.fall_9.000: Erm... Doctor Harriet? This is completely confidential, right?

entries.fall_18.000: Erm... Doctor Harriet? This is completely confidential, right?
entries.winter_18.002: Erm... Doctor Harriet? When you give her the shots, can we have two lollipops?

entries.fall_11.000: I gotta go visit Aunt Doctor today... Great.$7

entries.summer_4.000: Dammit... I almost forgot. I have to go see Doctor Harriet today.

entries.harveyBalloon: @,^I have a surprise for you. Meet me by the railroad tracks. ^   -Harriet
entries.passedOut3_Billed: @,^Someone dropped you off at the clinic last night. You'd passed out from exhaustion!^You've got to take better care of yourself and go to bed at a reasonable hour.^I've billed you {0}g to cover your medical expenses.^^-Dr. Harriet
entries.passedOut3_NotBilled: @,^Someone dropped you off at the clinic last night. You'd passed out from exhaustion!^You've got to take better care of yourself and go to bed at a reasonable hour.^Since you have no money, I provided your medical care free of charge.^^-Dr. Harriet

Changes.LogName: Female Harvey Maru Spouse Luau Genderization

entries.Maru_spouse: Harriet keeps trying to talk to me, but all I want is a piece of this roast.

entries.7/f Maru 1000/p Maru: Hospital_Ambient/-1000 -1000/farmer -10000 -10000 0 Maru 9 15 3 Harvey 7 10 0/skippable/changeSprite Maru Hospital/changePortrait Maru Hospital/showFrame Maru 18/viewport 10 15/pause 4000/speak Maru "*sigh*... I'm so sick of preparing these samples...$s"/pause 2000/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 10 19/pause 100/playSound throw/showFrame Maru 17/shake Maru 2000/jump Maru/specificTemporarySprite maruBeaker/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 1250/showFrame Maru 0/faceDirection Maru 2/pause 100/speak Maru "Agh! Oh no!... $4"/pause 600/showFrame Maru 16/pause 1000/speak Maru "The whole sample is ruined... Harriet's going to kill me...$s"/pause 600/showFrame Maru 0/faceDirection Maru 0/pause 1500/faceDirection Maru 2/pause 400/speak Maru "$q 38 null#@, what should I do?#$r 38 -50 Event_Hospital_1#Just scoop it off the floor. She won't know the difference.#$r 39 -20 Event_Hospital_2#Tell Harriet it was my fault.#$r 38 50 Event_Hospital_3#Tell Harriet it was an accident."/move Harvey 3 0 2/move Harvey 0 2 2/doAction 10 13/move Harvey 0 1 2/faceDirection Maru 1/speak Harvey "What happened? I heard something break."/pause 500/speak Maru "$p 38#I accidentally dropped one of the samples... I'm so sorry.$s|@ came in and slammed the door so loud I dropped this sample.$u"/fork toldTruth/move Harvey 0 2 3/emote Harvey 40/speak Harvey "You shouldn't blame others for your own problems, Maru.$a"/pause 300/faceDirection Harvey 1/speak Harvey "*sigh*... I'll have to call the patient back in to recollect this sample.$s#$b#This'll probably put us in the red for another month...$s"/pause 600/faceDirection Maru 2/pause 1000/showFrame Maru 16/pause 500/emote farmer 28/end
entries.toldTruth: move Harvey 0 2 3/speak Harvey "Thanks for telling me the truth, Maru.#$b#Don't worry about the sample, we'll just get another one."/pause 500/emote Harvey 32/pause 500/speak Maru "Thanks for being patient with me, Doctor Harriet."/pause 500/speak Harvey "Of course... you've been a big help around here. I don't know what I'd do without you!"/pause 500/emote Maru 32/pause 1000/faceDirection Harvey 2/pause 500/emote Harvey 8/speak Harvey "@? You look a little pale... are you feeling okay?"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/emote farmer 28/end
entries.571102/f Harvey 2000: Hospital_Ambient/-100 -100/farmer -200 -2000 0 Harvey 4 5 0/skippable/changeLocation HarveyRoom/showFrame Harvey 23/viewport 5 6 true/pause 1000/speak Harvey "Hello? Hello? Is anyone out there?$9"/pause 1300/emote Harvey 40/speak Harvey "This is Dr. H at... 52 North 43.5 East... Seeking aerial response...Anyone out there?$9"/pause 2000/emote Harvey 40/pause 700/playSound newArtifact/message "Copy.. Dr. H on the ground... this is Blackbird Fiver Fiver Zuzu. Anything to report?"/showFrame Harvey 28/jump Harvey/pause 800/speak Harvey "Someone's there!?$10#$b#Er... I mean!... Standard ground report: Wind at 3 Clicks, 36 Degrees North of West. Ground Temperature at 42 Kraggs. Humidity 53%. Dr. H out!$10"/pause 300/playMusic kindadumbautumn/faceDirection Harvey 1 true/move Harvey 2 0 1/speak Harvey "Yikes, my pulse is soaring...$7"/pause 400/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 6 12/move farmer 0 -3 0/faceDirection Harvey 2/speak Harvey "@!"/question fork1 "#Ask Harriet why she's all flustered.#Pretend like everything's normal."/fork normal/pause 500/speak Harvey "Ah, well... You see, I was just on my radio here... and I made contact with a real pilot!"/emote Harvey 16/speak Harvey "As a matter of fact, we can probably see him flying overhead right now!"/move Harvey 0 1 3/move Harvey -3 0 0/move Harvey 0 -2 0/speak Harvey "Quick, get over here!"/speed farmer 4/move farmer 0 -3 3/speed farmer 4/move farmer -4 0 0/speed farmer 4/move farmer 0 -2 0/speed farmer 4/speak Harvey "Look!"/globalFade/cutscene plane/viewport -1000 -1000/speak Harvey "As a kid, my dream was always to be a pilot."/pause 1000/speak Harvey "...But with my bad eyesight and a crippling fear of heights, that dream started to fade away.$s"/faceDirection Harvey 3/faceDirection farmer 1/viewport 5 6 true/pause 1600/emote farmer 28/speak Harvey "It's okay... don't be sad.#$b#I've grown to accept my station in life. Not everyone can achieve their dreams... that's just the way the world is."/pause 1600/speak Harvey "Hey, let me show you my model airplanes. I just finished the new TR-Starbird deluxe set.$h"/advancedMove Harvey false 0 2 4 0/faceDirection farmer 2/globalFade .003/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/end

entries.winter_15.000: What an interesting aroma...#$b#I should ask about any medicinal qualities that incense might have!$h
Good evening, @! Isn't this just a fascinating operation?$h#$b#Merchants from near and far...I bet they've had some interesting experiences, that's for sure.
I was thinking I might get an exotic souvenir.$h#$b#For whom, you ask? Well...#$b#The Feast of the Winter Star is coming up, you know...$4
